mapper.select: SELECT mcode, mate_ver_cd, mate_name, mate_type, sto_con, unit, std, piece_unit, conver_qty, moqty, safe_stock, edate, corigin, is_used, regi, modi, cha_rea, reg_dt, note FROM MATERIAL WHERE is_used = 'f1' ORDER BY mcode

SELECT mcode, mate_ver_cd, mate_name, mate_type, sto_con, unit, std, piece_unit, conver_qty, moqty, safe_stock, edate, corigin, is_used, regi, modi, cha_rea, reg_dt, note FROM material WHERE mcode = #{mcode} ORDER BY mate_ver_cd DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATERIAL ( mcode, mate_ver_cd, mate_name, mate_type, sto_con, unit, std, piece_unit, conver_qty, moqty, safe_stock, edate, corigin, is_used, regi, modi, cha_rea, reg_dt, note ) VALUES ( #{mcode}, #{mateVerCd}, #{mateName}, #{mateType}, #{stoCon}, #{unit}, #{std}, #{pieceUnit}, #{converQty}, #{moqty}, #{safeStock}, #{edate}, #{corigin}, #{isUsed}, #{regi}, #{modi}, #{chaRea}, SYSDATE, #{note} )
INSERT INTO MATE_SUPPLIER ( mate_cp_cd, mcode, mate_ver_cd, cp_cd, unit_price, ltime ) VALUES ( #{mateCpCd}, #{mcode}, #{mateVerCd}, #{cpCd}, #{unitPrice}, #{ltime} )
mapper.select: SELECT mcode, mate_ver_cd, mate_name, mate_type, sto_con, unit, std, piece_unit, conver_qty, moqty, safe_stock, edate, corigin, is_used, regi, modi, cha_rea, reg_dt, note FROM ( SELECT mcode, mate_ver_cd, mate_name, mate_type, sto_con, unit, std, piece_unit, conver_qty, moqty, safe_stock, edate, corigin, is_used, regi, modi, cha_rea, reg_dt, note FROM material WHERE mcode = #{mcode} AND is_used = 'f1' ORDER BY mate_ver_cd DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT ms.mate_cp_cd, ms.mcode, ms.mate_ver_cd, ms.cp_cd, c.cp_name, ms.unit_price, ms.ltime FROM MATE_SUPPLIER ms LEFT JOIN COMPANY c ON ms.cp_cd = c.cp_cd WHERE ms.mcode = #{mcode} AND ms.mate_ver_cd = ( SELECT mate_ver_cd FROM (SELECT mate_ver_cd FROM MATERIAL WHERE mcode = #{mcode} ORDER BY mate_ver_cd DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )

SELECT mcode, mate_ver_cd, mate_name, mate_type, sto_con, unit, std, piece_unit, conver_qty, moqty, safe_stock, edate, corigin, is_used, regi, modi, cha_rea, reg_dt, note FROM material WHERE mcode = #{mcode} AND is_used = 'f1'

SELECT ms.mate_cp_cd, ms.mcode, ms.mate_ver_cd, ms.cp_cd, c.cp_name, ms.unit_price, ms.ltime FROM MATE_SUPPLIER ms LEFT JOIN COMPANY c ON ms.cp_cd = c.cp_cd WHERE ms.mcode = #{mcode} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ms.mate_ver_cd, 2)) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE material SET is_used = 'f2' WHERE mcode = #{mcode} AND is_used = 'f1'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MATE_SUPPLIER WHERE mcode = #{mcode}
